title: Equipment Redeployment Environmental Compliance
description: A logistics officer must ensure all vehicles being redeployed are thoroughly cleaned to prevent the transport of foreign soil, seeds, or contaminants.

tasks.description: Review the environmental compliance and agricultural cleaning requirements for all vehicles returning to the home country.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer understands the specific cleaning standards that must be met.

tasks.description: Schedule all vehicles to go through a designated wash rack facility before being loaded onto transport.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer creates a schedule for all vehicles to be cleaned.

tasks.description: Track the cleaning and inspection status of each vehicle to ensure 100% compliance before shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Officer maintains an accurate log and ensures no unclean vehicles are shipped.
